priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Medical History Event Date Type Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C124301

self.title: CDISC SDTM Medical History Event Date Type Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the classification of the medical condition or event by which MHSTDTC is defined.
name: Medical History Event Date Type
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Medical History Event Date Type Terminology

terms.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results or summary of such an investigation. (NCI)
The return of a disease after a period of remission.
A noteworthy happening that is distinctive in a series of related events.
An increase in frequency and/or worsening of a symptom, condition, or disease.
A sudden worsening of a disease, condition, or symptom.
Diagnosis based on a pathological assessment.
The point at which the symptoms began or were first noted.
